Astroblast says to Killfest as he approaches, "Hurry it up there, we 
don't have all day..." Grumbling over his speakers, "..slag them 
some other time, they will regret this..."


On 11 Feb 2001, at 6:18, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> The 25 shot rule was supposed to be for shots like BA's leg guns. The 
> shots that are being shot in this battle would fall into the 4-shot 
> max category. My next post will be about that.
> 
> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Scyther/Incarcinator/Prowl/Greven/Demise::
> 
> Killfest flips backwatds from the explosion of Firearm's charge 
> against his back. He recieves Astroblast's transmission and spins 
> around, flying toward the shuttle-bot.
> 
> "I'm ready to leave," he says into his comm, boosting toward 
> Astroblast with Firearm in pursuit. He was quickly losing the Maximal 
> bacause Firearm had to deal with avoiding the Energonians' gunfire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBringer manages to stabalize himself in space, flying toward 
> Astroblast.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther stops in midflight, recieving an order from Killfest to 
> retreat. He activates his comm.
> 
> "Pinsir, Incarcinator, meet me back at the shuttle, we're getting out 
> of here," he says into the comm, boosting back toward the shuttle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Incarcinator growls, continuing to try and crush Prowl in his grasp. 
> The Maximals armor was very strong, but that didn't stop Incarcinator 
> from continuing to try to squeeze Prowl to death. He feels Prowl's 
> palms pushing on him to try to get him away, but the Maximal had no 
> chance of success with just pushing. Incarcinator recieves Scyther's 
> transmission and activates his commlink to reply.
> 
> "I'm just a bin b-" is all he could say before two plates slide aside 
> on Prowl's palms, Bluestreaks daggers shooting out and passing into 
> and all the way through Incarcinator's torso, crossing somewhere 
> inside him and emerging from his back. His grip on Prowl fails, the 
> bot choking on some mechfluid and going into stasis lock.
> 
> Prowl pulls the daggers out of Incarcinator, boosting off back toward 
> the battle and leaving the stasis-locked bot floating toward earth.
> 
> "Thanks, Bluestreak," he says, looking back at the four streams of 
> mechfluid emerging from Incarcinator's body.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Greven and Demise also recieve Killfest's transmission, but their 
> shuttle had been destroyed when they arrived. Grimmler turns, flying 
> toward a Predacon shuttle.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise stabalizes in the air, also flying toward a Predacon shuttle 
> upon recieving Killfest's orders.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: yah... 25 shots everytime is way extreme even if it is with in 
> the rules.
> > 
> > Astroblast having transformed into shuttle mode already, opens 
> > a comm-link to Killfest and EndBringer, "Looks like a retreat this 
> time, 
> > are you coming?" He swoops towards Motormaster catching him in 
> > his hatch.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
